objects.name: Fighting_Instructions
objects.string:
Press "F" to fight the animal control! 
Every time you touch the truck, you lose 5 energy.

content.text:
Press "F" to fight the animal control! 
Every time you touch the truck, you lose 5 energy.

objects.name: instructions
objects.string: That sound means you have a way of getting back home!! Find the green orb and enter it!

content.text: That sound means you have a way of getting back home!! Find the green orb and enter it!
